description: This is a React component implementing a product list page with search, filters, and delete functionality. It interacts with external API functions listProducts and deleteProduct, and composes several child components such as SearchBar, Filters, and ProductTable.

methods.name: ProductList({ onAdd, onEdit })
methods.description: Main React functional component for listing products with search and filters, handling data fetching and deletion.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles deletion of a product, confirming with the user and updating state after API call.
